title: So, how do you deal with "first time new champ" in ranked?
body: If u're been playing this game for at least more than 1 year, it sure as hell happened to you at least once to get that one guy with the special brain that decided to test the new champion released 2 hours before in ur ranked. Now, how do you deal with those people? U ban the champion risking that the troll actually trolls? U dodge? U don't play ranked for 2 weeks waiting for people to actually understand what that champion does?
